name: Anchor (stefanomusilli)
description:
Developed for Bullet Hell Jam 2022.

Move with WASD, shoot with the Arrow Keys. Dash with LShift or RShift.

The player is confined to a small space by a line connected to the centre. The line will get longer when you defeat enemies, allowing you to move further. The line can also be used to damage enemies on contact, which will power up your weapon.

Any kind of feedback would be appreciated.

Game by Stefano Musilli

Sound assets by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Royalty free music by Muzaproduction, REDproductions, Beats_Beats
